/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the bustling city life. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few clouds scattered across it, suggesting a bright and sunny day.
